definition/examples: Identifier of the sample
Sequencing method used (e.g. Illumina HiSeq 2000)
source: GSC MIxS/MIGS Bacteria, ENA Metadata Validation: Instrument

definition/examples: Single-end, paired- end or others
Genomic, metagenomic, transcriptomic, etc.
WGS, Amplicon, etc.
Random, PCR, etc.
Literature reference or SOP describing nucleic extraction i.e. CTAB extraction, Phenol-Cloroform Extraction
Treatment of nucleic acid after extraction i.e. DNase, RNase
for inner dist. calc (or incl. in lib_layout?). Array Express parameter: insert Nominal Length
Number of reads in the library (sequencing depth)
Number of base pairs (nucleotides) in the library
As basepairs_count divided by sequence_count
Number of reads in the library (sequencing depth) after quality filtering
Number of base pairs (nucleotides) in the library after quality filtering
Depletion (Pre-seq, molecular), Removal (Post-seq data), None
source: Advances and Challenges in Metatranscriptomic Analysis (Shakya, Migun et al. (2019))

definition/examples: Technique used to amplify a cDNA library i.e. MMLV, AMV
Type of primer used for cDNA synthesis from RNA, i.e. polyA or random
Hash value (e.g. MD5) for data integrity
Accessions/identifiers linking to the raw data (FASTQ)
e.g. GAAA01000000 93507 rc mRNA linear TSA 20-JUL-2015
